price: N’ikirere twakigize igisenge kirinzwe, nyamara birengagiza ibitangaza byacyo (izuba, ukwezi, inyenyeri,...).
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā al-samāa saqfan maḥfūẓan wahum ʿan āyātihā muʿ'riḍūna
